title: Oceanic Stream ~ Chizzele  BRONZE TO CHALLENGER
body:
Whilst im painfully aware the season resets tomorrow, I have been doing the bronze to challenger challenge for a month or so, starting at B5 and currently set at P4.

I absolutely love interacting with viewers, meeting new people and more than anything creating a tight nit group of people who genuinely enjoy the stream.

I answer questions, take suggestions and most of all try and provide some fun gameplay that's enjoyable :)

Thank you so much if you come and have a look, thank you even more if you stay for a while and if you follow or donate, just, wow

replies.body: what is your main account called?
